testcase.name: View PUP Downloadable Forms - Downloads for Faculty and Employees
testcase.system-out: Given def step0 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step1 = 'Browser navigates to PUP search website' ................. passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph' ......................................... passed And def step2 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * maximize() .............................................................. passed And def step3 = 'User click services modal' ............................... passed * click('.services-widget') ............................................... passed And def step4 = 'User click Faculty Member or Employee button' ............ passed * click('{^a}Faculty Member or Employee') ................................. passed And click('//li[10]//div[1]//a[1]') ....................................... passed Then waitForUrl('https://www.pup.edu.ph/downloads/employees/') ............ passed
